original_title: "Как же мне выбраться из этого лабиринта страданий?"
overview: Ailan, a senior student in film studies, has a last shooting day of her capstone  project. She invites her father who is a film director with whom she has a very cold relationship  due to his criticality towards her artistic choices. She wants to be seen as a good filmmaker and  get validation from him that she needs. Her shooting day becomes heated with the help of an  annoying actor that was invited to play a role out of pity to him. Everything becomes more  complicated when her boyfriend visits her on the set and breaks up with her explaining that this  relationship isn’t really working and they can not be together. Broken heart becomes the last  straw in this day of misfortunes after what she loses herself and starts a fight with her dad, who  was feeding her rage throughout the day. Ailan gets lost in her labyrinth of suffering and the film  remains unfinished.
title: "How Will I Ever Get Out of This Labyrinth of Suffering?"
